name: Butterfree
flavorText:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.

previous.name: Metapod
previous.flavorText:
This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

next.name: Weedle
next.flavorText:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.flavorText:
Its short feet are tipped with suction
pads that enable it to tirelessly climb
slopes and walls.

exposing its weak
and tender body.
